name: gandi
title: Gandi
description: Manage your Gandi domains, DNS records, and check domain availability
author: kud

commands.name: list-domains
commands.title: List Domains
commands.subtitle: Gandi
commands.description: List all domains in your Gandi account with their status and expiration dates

commands.name: check-availability
commands.title: Check Domain Availability
commands.subtitle: Gandi
commands.description: Check if a domain name is available for registration

commands.name: manage-dns
commands.title: Manage DNS Records
commands.subtitle: Gandi
commands.description: Manage DNS records for your domains

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
